column6:
The boy survived Kristallnacht, the Einsatzgruppe, and the Warsaw Ghetto. But now Max Eisenhardt faces Hitler's Final Solution in the death camp known as Auschwitz-Birkenau. What will it take to endure? Who are the Sonderkommando? And will a vision of a girl named Magda bring hope - or horror? The definitive origin story of Magneto reaches its shattering conclusion. ,2009,2
Parental Advisory ...$3.99
